author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0013 add mkdistro-*.out output files to .gitignore file
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0012 parameterize pig artifactIds in the POMs
POMs have groupId and version parameterized with a property from the main POM.
The same should be done for the artifactIds to enable use of JARs available under alternate artifact names.
As with groupId and version, the default values should remain as today.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0011 Annotate Oozie group IDs in the POMs
Like for Oozie version occurrences, add a comment next to the
groupId, ie:
<groupId>com.yahoo.oozie</groupId> <!-- OOZIE_GROUP_ID -->
This annotation enables an easy replacement via scripting of the
value as it is already done with the value.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0010 Add a .gitignore file
To make GIT ignore Maven, Eclipse, Intellij, Structures101 and other build files/dirs
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0010 POM cleanup, remove unneeded repositories, remove/exclude
commons-cli 2.0
iThe main POM file contains references to snapshot repositories which
are not needed to build Oozie.
The core and example POM have references to commons-cli 2.0 that are
not needed.
The POMs of hadoop artifacts used by Oozie have references to
commons-cli 2.0 which are not needed and they should be excluded.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>
